criticalFailure.@en: As you drink deep from the vial, the blood tastes of ash. It cannot sate your own predilection for fresh blood. If you do not drink the blood from one of your own Ancestry within 24 hours, you move one step down the Damage Condition Track negatively (but don’t suffer an Injury due to it).

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you don’t suffer any Corruption whatsoever.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you move one step up the Damage Condition Track positively. However, you suffer 3 Corruption as a result.

reagents.@en: A pint of blood from one of your own Ancestry, imbibed (expended)
